inapplicable.description: Ensures every accesskey attribute value is unique
inapplicable.help: accesskey attribute value must be unique

inapplicable.description: Ensures <area> elements of image maps have alternate text
inapplicable.help: Active <area> elements must have alternate text

inapplicable.description: Ensures ARIA attributes are allowed for an element's role
inapplicable.help: Elements must only use allowed ARIA attributes

inapplicable.description: Ensures unsupported DPUB roles are only used on elements with implicit fallback roles
inapplicable.help: Unsupported DPUB ARIA roles should be used on elements with implicit fallback roles

inapplicable.description: Ensures elements with ARIA roles have all required ARIA attributes
inapplicable.help: Required ARIA attributes must be provided

inapplicable.description: Ensures elements with an ARIA role that require child roles contain them
inapplicable.help: Certain ARIA roles must contain particular children

inapplicable.description: Ensures elements with an ARIA role that require parent roles are contained by them
inapplicable.help: Certain ARIA roles must be contained by particular parents

inapplicable.description: Ensures all elements with a role attribute use a valid value
inapplicable.help: ARIA roles used must conform to valid values

inapplicable.description: Ensures all ARIA attributes have valid values
inapplicable.help: ARIA attributes must conform to valid values

inapplicable.description: Ensures attributes that begin with aria- are valid ARIA attributes
inapplicable.help: ARIA attributes must conform to valid names

inapplicable.description: Ensure the autocomplete attribute is correct and suitable for the form field
inapplicable.help: autocomplete attribute must be used correctly

inapplicable.description: Ensures <blink> elements are not used
inapplicable.help: <blink> elements are deprecated and must not be used

inapplicable.description: Ensures buttons have discernible text
inapplicable.help: Buttons must have discernible text

inapplicable.description: Ensures related <input type="checkbox"> elements have a group and that the group designation is consistent
inapplicable.help: Checkbox inputs with the same name attribute value must be part of a group

inapplicable.description: Ensures <dl> elements are structured correctly
inapplicable.help: <dl> elements must only directly contain properly-ordered <dt> and <dd> groups, <script> or <template> elements

inapplicable.description: Ensures <dt> and <dd> elements are contained by a <dl>
inapplicable.help: <dt> and <dd> elements must be contained by a <dl>

inapplicable.description: Ensures every id attribute value of active elements is unique
inapplicable.help: IDs of active elements must be unique

inapplicable.description: Ensures <iframe> and <frame> elements contain the axe-core script
inapplicable.help: Frames must be tested with axe-core

inapplicable.description: Ensures <iframe> and <frame> elements contain a unique title attribute
inapplicable.help: Frames must have a unique title attribute

inapplicable.description: Ensures <iframe> and <frame> elements contain a non-empty title attribute
inapplicable.help: Frames must have title attribute

inapplicable.description: Ensure that HTML elements with both valid lang and xml:lang attributes agree on the base language of the page
inapplicable.help: HTML elements with lang and xml:lang must have the same base language

inapplicable.description: Ensures <input type="image"> elements have alternate text
inapplicable.help: Image buttons must have alternate text

inapplicable.description: Ensures that every form element is not solely labeled using the title or aria-describedby attributes
inapplicable.help: Form elements should have a visible label

inapplicable.description: Ensures every form element has a label
inapplicable.help: Form elements must have labels

inapplicable.description: Ensures the contentinfo landmark is at top level
inapplicable.help: Contentinfo landmark must not be contained in another landmark

inapplicable.description: Ensures presentational <table> elements do not use <th>, <caption> elements or the summary attribute
inapplicable.help: Layout tables must not use data table elements

inapplicable.description: Ensures <marquee> elements are not used
inapplicable.help: <marquee> elements are deprecated and must not be used

inapplicable.description: Ensures <meta http-equiv="refresh"> is not used
inapplicable.help: Timed refresh must not exist

inapplicable.description: Ensures <object> elements have alternate text
inapplicable.help: <object> elements must have alternate text

inapplicable.description: Ensures related <input type="radio"> elements have a group and that the group designation is consistent
inapplicable.help: Radio inputs with the same name attribute value must be part of a group

inapplicable.description: Ensures the scope attribute is used correctly on tables
inapplicable.help: scope attribute should be used correctly

inapplicable.description: Ensures that server-side image maps are not used
inapplicable.help: Server-side image maps must not be used

inapplicable.description: Ensure all skip links have a focusable target
inapplicable.help: The skip-link target should exist and be focusable

inapplicable.description: Ensures tabindex attribute values are not greater than 0
inapplicable.help: Elements should not have tabindex greater than zero

inapplicable.description: Ensure that tables do not have the same summary and caption
inapplicable.help: The <caption> element should not contain the same text as the summary attribute

inapplicable.description: Ensure that each cell in a table using the headers refers to another cell in that table
inapplicable.help: All cells in a table element that use the headers attribute must only refer to other cells of that same table

inapplicable.description: Ensure that each table header in a data table refers to data cells
inapplicable.help: All th elements and elements with role=columnheader/rowheader must have data cells they describe

inapplicable.description: Ensures lang attributes have valid values
inapplicable.help: lang attribute must have a valid value

inapplicable.description: Ensures <video> elements have captions
inapplicable.help: <video> elements must have captions

inapplicable.description: Ensures <video> elements have audio descriptions
inapplicable.help: <video> elements must have an audio description track

nodes.html: Acreditamos que a confiança é primordial em um relacionamento. Nós não possuímos nem vendemos seus dados e certamente não fazemos transações bancárias em modelos de negócios baseados em publicidade. A única maneira de ganhar dinheiro é com as taxas de licença de software que você nos paga.

nodes.html: O software é o nosso ofício e a nossa paixão - e realizamos sua manutenção com investimentos incansáveis em P&D. Por esse motivo, preferimos exercer todos os domínios da tecnologia, incluindo a execução global de nossos data centers.

nodes.html: "A Zoho oferece uma gama de funcionalidades que precisamos para gerenciar nosso negócio e nossos processos de forma eficaz, economizando tempo e recursos."

nodes.html: Saiba mais sobre o Zoho

none.message: Element does not duplicate existing text in alt text

nodes.html: Acreditamos que a confiança é primordial em um relacionamento. Nós não possuímos nem vendemos seus dados e certamente não fazemos transações bancárias em modelos de negócios baseados em publicidade. A única maneira de ganhar dinheiro é com as taxas de licença de software que você nos paga.

none.message: Element does not duplicate existing text in alt text

nodes.html: Mais de vinte e cinco anos de administração de uma organização lucrativa oferece a nós um bom senso de desafios que uma empresa em crescimento enfrenta. Temos orgulho em administrar uma empresa sustentável que é movida por você, nosso cliente.

none.message: Element does not duplicate existing text in alt text

nodes.html: O software é o nosso ofício e a nossa paixão - e realizamos sua manutenção com investimentos incansáveis em P&D. Por esse motivo, preferimos exercer todos os domínios da tecnologia, incluindo a execução global de nossos data centers.

none.message: Element does not duplicate existing text in alt text

nodes.html: Em todos esses anos, é a confiança e a boa vontade de nossos clientes que nos ajudaram a estabelecer uma posição forte no mercado. Não importa o tamanho da sua empresa, estamos aqui para ajudar você a crescer.
